channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Appeals court upholds block against Trump's effort to end birthright citizenship
item.description: The ruling keeps a block on the Trump administration from denying citizenship to children born to people who are in the United States illegally or tem...

item.title: Thai and Cambodian soldiers fire at each other in disputed border area
item.description: Thai and Cambodian soldiers fired at each other in contested border area Thursday after the nations downgraded their diplomatic relations in a rapidly...

item.title: Frustrated by NIMBYs, states are trying to force cities to build affordable housing
item.description: Utah's leaders worry skyrocketing home prices are keeping young people from creating wealth. It's among a growing number of states — red and blue — pa...

item.title: Thai and Cambodian troops clash at disputed border
item.description: At least two Thai soldiers are hurt as both sides accuse each other of firing the first shot.

item.title: Devil's Island
item.description: An ex-Marine with a secret life and a secret wife. A five-year investigation turns on shocking DNA evidence -- is the one-time hero a killer, too? "48...

item.title: 7/23: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: WSJ: Justice Department told Trump in May he is in Epstein files; Rahm Emanuel rebukes current state of Democratic Party.

item.title: In a Haitian city ruled by gangs, young rape survivor raises baby she was told to abort
item.description: Helene, abducted aged 17, is among thousands of women attacked as gang violence spreads in Haiti.

item.title: White House hits back at reports Trump named in Epstein files
item.description: It came as a US judge denied a justice department's bid to unseal Florida court files on Epstein.

item.title: A mother's heartbreak: The unresolved mystery of missing Indian student
item.description: A student of India's JNU university, Najeeb Ahmed went missing in 2016. A court now has closed the case.

item.title: 7/23: The Daily Report
item.description: Jericka Duncan reports on the sentencing of Bryan Kohberger in the murder of four Idaho college students, a double ruling in the case of Kilmar Abrego...

item.title: Can you un-bleach coral? BBC visits remote reef to find out
item.description: The BBC's Katy Watson went to Australia's Ningaloo reef, the site of a mass bleaching event, to find out if the damage can be undone.

item.title: Columbia to pay $200M settlement to federal government over investigations

item.title: Click for a Killer: Part 1
item.description: A "48 Hours" investigation into one murder leads into the dark web and to the disruption of four potential murder-for-hire plots. Correspondent Peter ...

item.title: OK, is Martin Van Buren responsible for the tiny word that punches above its weight?

item.title: Six months of 'shock and awe' on immigration enforcement

item.title: Judge bars ICE from immediately taking Abrego Garcia into custody if he’s released from jail
Bryan Kohberger gets life in prison but leaves loved ones of Idaho students he killed wondering why
item.description: A judge has ordered Bryan Kohberger to serve life in prison without parole for killing four University of Idaho students.

item.title: Columbia University agrees to pay more than $220M in deal with Trump to restore federal funding
